snippet.title: CHAOTIC ERA | Official Early Access Gameplay Trailer 2023
snippet.description:
CHAOTIC ERA NOW AVAILABLE IN EARLY ACCESS (PC/MAC): https://bobbybobbybobby.itch.io/chaotic-era

Chaotic Era is an atmospheric strategy game inspired by classic science fiction, following a stranded human crew on an alien planet.

At its core, Chaotic Era is a minimalist, lightweight, action-packed reimagining of the golden era of real time strategy. Chaotic Era has been featured in publications like TechCrunch, Polygon, Business Insider, Wireframe Magazine, and more.

www.bobbybobbybobby.com

------

"We left it all behind. Old Earth and its doomed children. Titan, Io, the floating cities of Venus. Mars' cursed wastelands..."

In the late 28th century, as the Solar System collapses, Old Earth’s corporate warlords launch thousands of starships in search of a new home, but the reality of deep space is far more horrifying than anyone could have imagined...

Take command of your crew, land on a new planet and scavenge for resources to keep your shipwrecked team alive. 

In the world of Chaotic Era, energy is scarce. Use your reserves strategically to power life support, build weapons and defences, uncover hidden territory, and research new technology.

Plan carefully. Your interstellar trip has awakened unknown terrors from beyond. Waves of monsters emerge from the shadows at night; and every planet is uniquely chaotic with variable terrain, resources, and climate.

------

www.bobbybobbybobby.com

www.twitter.com/chaotic_era

www.twitter.com/bobbydimension
